:::{.callout-note collapse="false" title="Abstract"}
Tunable self Q-switched Ytterbium pump and spectral filtering of Raman stokes is used to generate pulsed output at wavelengths spanning 1100nm-1600nm having pulse width ~150ns with ~40kHz repetition rate and peak powers greater than ~20W.
:::
